amendment.description: Amendment extends small business procurement contracting goals to include overseas contracts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-137 to extend small business contracting goals to overseas contracts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuler amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 398 - 29 (Roll no. 320).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Shuler.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
